content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: I need to craft sandstone_wall. This requires placing 6 sandstone in a 2x3 formation in the crafting grid. I will first move one sandstone from slot 43 into slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]
thought: I will now move the next sandstone into slot 2 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: I will now move the next sandstone into slot 3 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have placed 3 sandstone in the first row, I will move the next sandstone into slot 4 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have placed 1 sandstone in the second row, I will move the next sandstone into slot 5 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that I have placed 2 sandstone in the second row, I will move the last sandstone into slot 6 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sandstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 22, "index": 19}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 64, "index": 29}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "petrified_oak_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have placed all the sandstone in the crafting grid, I will craft the sandstone_wall and move it to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
